original_title: Felling of Hibson Road Brick Works Chimney in Nelson
overview: It is a dramatic film, with its colossal explosion and smouldering remains. Within seconds of the chimney's collapse, crowds swarm in to inspect the site; issues of the crowd's health and safety are clearly not a concern, as people smile, wave and salute the camera.
title: Felling of Hibson Road Brick Works Chimney in Nelson
